content: this pattern was designed by me for personal use it is available free on the grounds that it is not in any way linked to sanrio who created chococat it is my own interpretation this will also remain a free pattern as long as no profit is made from it or any items made using it **n b i have seen someone else selling a pattern for this character that is incredibly similar to my own i can assure you that this is an *original design* and that i *made it up on my own* and did not pinch it from anyone ** if you would like a copy of the pattern please email me at culturedpurls@live com and i will send you the pattern **
